item.title: Booting with Limine
item.description: Let’s boot the operating system with a simpler bootloader! A couple of days ago, I was informed of a modern and simpler bootloader named “Limine” and I just wanted to give it a go. This is the implementation of the boot protocol with the same name. It aims to do what conventional ones do but in a simpler way, or so I’m told. Originally, the project was booting on BIOS using grub2.
